original_title: Juice=Juice FCイベント2019 ～メリクリ×Juice×BoxⅣ～
overview: Juice=Juice FC Event 2019 ~Meri Kuri×Juice×Box IV~ (Juice=Juice FCイベント2019 ～メリクリ×Juice×BoxⅣ～) was Juice=Juice's Christmas 2019 fanclub event. Three shows took place on December 21, 2019 at TFT Hall 1000.  The deadline to pre-order the fanclub-exclusive DVD was on February 27, 2020[1] and it was released to fanclub members on April 25, 2020.
title: Juice=Juice FC Event 2019 ~Meri Kuri×Juice×Box IV~
